options: AWS EC2 is a virtual server in the AWS Cloud

AWS EC2 is a serverless compute service
questions.correct_answer: AWS EC2 is a virtual server in the AWS Cloud

questions.correct_answer: Data centers that deliver data fast to the users

What is the purpose of AWS Organizations service?
options: AWS Organizations helps you manage multiple AWS Accounts
AWS Organizations optimizes your system performance

AWS Organizations groups your applications and manages them
questions.correct_answer: AWS Organizations helps you manage multiple AWS Accounts

Which sentence best describes AWS CloudWatch?
options: CloudWatch monitors your account and recommends you cost optimization and performance improvement actions.
CloudWatch is a monitoring service that monitors your resources, and configures automatic alarms.
CloudWatch is a service tha logs your AWS environment Actions. It is used to create events that describe how your application is being used.
questions.correct_answer: CloudWatch is a monitoring service that monitors your resources, and configures automatic alarms.
